articles.title: The Semiconductor Moment: India eyes becoming chip hub as demand for new oil heightens - The Economic Times
articles.description: Even if one large semiconductor fabrication unit becomes operational soon, India will need at least 40 of those by 2030. If it can attract smaller units, the country may need 80-90 such fabrication units just to meet domestic consumption targets.
